solution_line_template: She drinks 1/5 of a bottle of sparkling water every night so over an entire year she drinks {fraction_consumed_per_night_decimal}*{days_in_year} = <<{fraction_consumed_per_night_fraction}*{days_in_year}={total_bottles_consumed_yearly}>>{total_bottles_consumed_yearly} bottles of sparkling water

Every bottle costs ${cost_per_bottle} and she drinks {total_bottles_consumed_yearly} bottles a year so she spends {cost_per_bottle}*{total_bottles_consumed_yearly} = $<<{cost_per_bottle}*{total_bottles_consumed_yearly}={total_annual_spend}>>{total_annual_spend} a year on sparkling water
